title: McDonald's India to use word cheese in products as FSSAI and NABL verify quality
description: Westlife Foodworld, operator of McDonald's in West and South India, has been given a clean chit by Maharashtra FDA and FSSAI for the quality of cheese used in their products. The temporary renaming of products had a slight impact on the business.
